aboutText: The PMI Chapter Awards program provides recognition of volunteer efforts, motivates chapter leaders, and acknowledges their contributions toward achieving PMI's goals.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Kazakhstan Chapter | Europe Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: Annual Project Management Forum in Almaty, Kazakhstan.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Lahore, Pakistan Chapter | Asia Pacific Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: PMI Chapter Annual Meetup.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Lebanon Chapter | Middle East/North Africa Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: The PMI Lebanon Chapter board during a monthly talk.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Senegal Chapter | Sub-Saharan Africa Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: Chapter Volunteers engaging with local communities to support agro-business farms producing, commercializing, distributing, conserving farm products, and prioritizing local products in Senegal.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Gujarat, India Chapter | South Asia Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: PMIGJC members gathering to celebrate 'Chapter of the Year' award.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Calumet Chapter | North America Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: PMI Calumet Chapter - Global Month of Service supporting the Foodbank of Northwest Indiana for Social Good.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Santa Catarina, Brazil Chapter | Latin America Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: Volunteers from the PMI Santa Catarina, Brazil Chapter.
